messages.messageBody:
Sorry if this is old hat for some -

http://www.soulsmithing.com/LIB/ARTICLES/NBSK/NBSKEN.html

Lots of talk of this last Summer. Really just want to share my
friends webpage with all, still under construction but looking very
promising.
Check it out,
-t

Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil
